channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Après Nvidia, c’est au tour des GPU AMD de voir leur connecteur fondre et on pense connaître le coupable
item.description: Un internaute a eu la désagréable surprise de voir le connecteur de sa carte graphique AMD présenter des marques de brûlures.

item.title: Le Galaxy S26 Ultra pourrait enfin corriger ce gros défaut de ses vidéos
item.description: Une nouvelle vague de fuites autour de la série Galaxy S26 laisse penser que Samsung prépare quelque chose de bien plus ambitieux pour le modèle Ultra que pour le reste de la gamme. De quoi intéresser tous ceux qui utilisent leur smartphone comme caméra principale, sans vouloir passer sur un hybride ou un boîtier pro.

item.title: Plus sobres et plus efficaces : TSMC ouvre la voie aux puces ultra-performantes de nos futurs smartphones
item.description: La gravure 2 nm de TSMC est désormais une réalité industrielle. En lançant la production de masse de son node N2 dans les délais annoncés, le fondeur taïwanais pose les fondations des puces de nouvelle génération que l'on retrouvera dans nos smartphones l'année prochaine. Mais ce niveau de gravure est tout aussi technique que géopolitique.

item.title: Ryan Coogler Drops More Hints About His ‘X-Files’ Reboot
item.description: Plus, Monkey Productions addresses those MCU rumors.

item.title: This smart garden turned my black thumb green
item.description: I can't grow anything. Multiple attempts to create a cottage garden, first in Idaho and now in South Carolina, have brought disappointment. Both are challenging climates, but where others have succeeded, I've been left with little more than a pile of cherry tomatoes for my vast efforts (those things are bulletproof). I'd all but given […]

item.title: The top 26 consumer/edtech companies from Disrupt Startup Battlefield
item.description: Here is the full list of the consumer/edtech Startup Battlefield 200 selectees, along with a note on what made us select them for the competition.

item.title: Netflix is removing 54 of its best movies – including these 3 gripping action films with over 90% on Rotten Tomatoes
item.description: Don't miss these 3 action blockbusters before they leave Netflix in the new year.

item.title: The AI conversation is a mess — and that’s stopping us from making good decisions
item.description: When it comes to AI, clearer language and understanding will help us make better choices.

item.title: I'm transforming Windows 11 in 2026 using PowerToys – here's how you can too
item.description: If you thought PowerToys was a mysterious suite of high-powered tools for enthusiast tinkerers only, well, think again.

item.title: This iPhone 17 rival proves non-Pro phones don't have to compromise on cameras and battery life
item.description: The Vivo X300 proves that compact and lightweight phones can deliver a true flagship package.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, December 31 (game #934)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Wednesday, December 31 (game #1437)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Wednesday, December 31 (game #668)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Build responsible AI for education
item.description: How to balance innovation with proven learning impact Artificial intelligence is reshaping the global workforce and rapidly expanding the expectations placed on today’s learners. The World Economic Forum predicts that technological advancements like AI, alongside economic and demographic factors, will lead to a net increase of 78 million global jobs this decade. Educational institutions now face a pivotal moment. They must evolve how students learn, how instructors teach, and how technology supports each step of that journey....

item.title: Software resilience testing is more critical than ever
item.description: So why don’t more companies do it? When internet services platform Cloudflare suffered an outage in November, it took a big chunk of the online world down with it.

item.title: Is AI getting smarter, or information leakier?
item.description: How Inception is mirroring the market If you’re a millennial or simply a fan of sci-fi, you likely remember 2010’s smash hit Inception, written and directed by Christopher Nolan. The story follows Dom Cobb (played by Leonardo DiCaprio), a professional thief who specializes in stealing privileged secrets from people’s minds while they dream. He uses advanced technology to enter another person’s subconscious while they’re asleep and take whatever information he wants. The problem DiCaprio’s character faces is that the line between reality and dreams become blurred, making it increasingly difficu...

item.title: Batteries : l’Europe tient-elle enfin sa revanche sur la Chine grâce au sel et au charbon ?
item.description: Si elle a toujours été éclipsée par le lithium, la batterie au sodium (au sel) suscite désormais un intérêt croissant pour les industriels du stockage énergétique. Au Royaume-Uni, des chercheurs essaient de maîtriser localement la production de cette nouvelle technologie.

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Trailer Goes to Eleven
item.description: Millie Bobby Brown's character takes center stage—finally!—in our first tiny glimpse at the Netflix hit's explosive conclusion.

item.title: Asus aurait trouvé une solution contre la pénurie de RAM, mais pas celle qu’on attendait
item.description: Une source affirme connaître le plan du constructeur Asus pour enrayer la crise de la mémoire RAM. Son idée est assez étonnante.

item.title: Bomb cyclone knocks out power for thousands in Midwest as winter storm moves east
item.description: According to Poweroutage.us., over 153,000 customers were without power on Tuesday, more than a third of them in Michigan. A wild winter storm was expected to bring strong winds, heavy snow and frigid temperatures to the Great Lakes and Northeast on Tuesday, a day after a bomb cyclone barreled across the northern U.S. and left tens thousands of customers without power.The storm that hit parts of the Plains and Great Lakes on Monday brought sharply colder air, strong winds and a mix of snow, ice and rain that led to treacherous travel. Forecasters said it intensified quickly enough to meet the ...

item.title: Votre montre Samsung pourra bientôt détecter les signes précoces de démence : ce que l’on sait
item.description: Samsung travaille sur une nouvelle fonctionnalité permettant de collecter de nouvelles données de santé liées à l'activité cérébrale pour alerter les utilisateurs d'un potentiel déclin cognitif.

item.title: Ni lithium, ni cobalt : tout savoir sur la batterie au sel qui équipera certaines voitures dès 2026
item.description: Selon le géant chinois CATL, les batteries au sodium (au sel, sans lithium) devraient se développer à grande échelle à partir de 2026. Et tout particulièrement le cas dans le secteur des voitures électriques.

item.title: Les meilleurs claviers gaming mécaniques en 2025 : guide d’achat complet
item.description: Vous êtes perdus dans la jungle des claviers pour le gaming ? On fait le point sur les meilleurs modèles du marché et toutes les caractéristiques à prendre en compte avant d'acheter votre nouveau clavier mécanique pour jouer.

item.title: Adieu le flou : ce petit outil gratuit vous permet de retrouver la fluidité légendaire du CRT sur votre écran PC
item.description: Et si vous profitiez de la fluidité d'un écran CRT sur votre écran de PC ? ShaderBeam est un nouvel outil qui vous promet de retrouver la clarté de mouvement des écrans cathodiques sur n'importe quelle dalle moderne.

item.title: TCL’s New Paper-Like Tablet Has a Bunch of AI in It
item.description: The Note A1 Nxtpaper throws a lot of AI features at the wall.

item.title: I'm TechRadar Pro's hardware editor - here are the 9 coolest business tech we reviewed this year from world-first business laptops to electric office chairs
item.description: The best business tech we tested in 2025.

item.title: Les écrans pliants s’adaptent aux consoles portables
item.description: Et si la prochaine idée un peu folle du jeu mobile venait des écrans pliants ? One-Netbook, adepte des formats atypiques, s’attaque au concept de console portable avec la OneXSugar Wallet, un appareil hybride qui se plie et se déplie pour passer d’un objet compact à une machine de jeu à grand écran.

item.title: Ce sont peut-être les dernières offres avant la fin d’année pour la PS5 Slim
item.description: Compacte, dotée d'un espace de stockage confortable et toujours aussi performante, la PS5 Slim est bien placée sur le podium des consoles next-gen. Si vous n'avez pas encore craqué, sachez qu'elle est actuellement, et sûrement pour la dernière fois de cette fin d'année 2025, en promo : PC Componentes la propose en pack avec une DualSense supplémentaire à 494,88 euros au lieu de 599,99 euros, ou seule à 445,29 euros au lieu de 549,99 euros. ...

item.title: Final stretch of 2025 shows mixed shares in global markets
item.description: Most markets will not operate on New Year’s day, and some will also be closed Wednesday and Friday. Shares opened mixed in Europe on Tuesday after slipping in Asia as some regional markets wrapped up trading for the year.Crude oil prices edged higher and gold and silver resumed their ascent. U.S. futures were flat.In Tokyo, Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi rang out the final session for 2025 in a traditional year-end ceremony.“By realizing a Japanese economy that earns the trust of investors around the world, we will create a virtuous cycle in which global capital flows into Japan,” Taka...

item.title: Meta buys startup known for its AI task automation agents
item.description: Meta has acquired an AI startup called Manus — known for its custom research and website-building agents — in a deal valued at more than $2 billion, according toThe Wall Street Journal. It's reportedly one of the largest acquisitions yet involving a startup nurtured in China's AI ecosystem. Manus arrived in March 2025, shortly after another Chinese AI startup, DeepSeek appeared on the scene. The company (called Butterfly Effect at the time) originally described it as "the first general AI agent" to perform complex tasks autonomously, rather than just generating ideas. It draws from several th...

item.title: Thor Dreads Loss in the Latest ‘Avengers: Doomsday’ Trailer
item.description: Chris Hemsworth returns as the god of thunder in our latest look at the next 'Avengers' movie.

item.title: The Canon EOS R6 Mark III is great, but this lens is amazing
item.description: Canon's new EOS R6 Mark III is an excellent camera. It's not a groundbreaking upgrade to the 3-year-old R6 Mark II, but it takes the same body with great ergonomics and adds more resolution, video that now goes up to 7K with open-gate filming, and improved autofocus performance. If you're in need of an impeccably […]

item.title: Here’s what you should know about the US TikTok deal
item.description: A number of investors are competing for the opportunity to purchase the app, and if a deal were to go through, the platform's U.S. business could have its valuation soar to upward of $60 billion.

item.title: I tested the Cuisinart FlexPrep 1.1L– a budget-friendly but incredibly powerful food processor
item.description: The Cuisinart FlexPrep 1.1L Food Processor packs a lot of power in a compact package, delivering high-quality results with impressive speed.

item.title: TCL introduces its own take on a color Kindle Scribe
item.description: Hot on the tail of Amazon's Kindle Scribe Colorosoft, TCL is introducing its own take on a distraction-free note-taking and reading device. Unlike the new Scribe, however, it doesn't use E Ink. The TCL Note A1 NXTPAPER is the company's latest device to use NXTPAPER, TCL's custom paper-like LCD screen, which offers some of the qualities of E Ink without the limitations.TCL says the 11.5-inch color "NXTPAPER Pure" display on the Note A1 has a 2,200 x 1,440 resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate, which should mean it looks clearer and feels much smoother to interact with than the color E Ink screen ...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra : une vidéo dévoile son design massif en avance
item.description: L'année 2025 se termine sur une note explosive pour les fans de Samsung. Alors que la présentation officielle n'est attendue qu'en février, une fuite d'une ampleur inédite vient de lever le voile sur le design définitif des futurs fleurons de la marque.

item.title: Samsung is reportedly readying a Brain Health feature to check for early signs of dementia
item.description: Brain Health by Samsung is apparently going to be launching at the CES 2026 show in January.
